content: little washies brenda k b anderson i learned something after having twins last year babies are crazy-messy i wasn t quite prepared for the massive amount of burp cloths washcloths dishcloths and wipes that were required to keep things under control and a lot of the cloths that i had were bigger than they needed to be- i just needed a little bit of somethin here and there and also here… and don t forget about there too to tidy up hence the little washies obviously big people are messy too- so don t feel like you gotta wait around for one of your friends to pop out a baby in order to make these they are as practical as can be with their own basket to keep them organized- anyone could use a set 1 materials gauge for the basket you will need gauge for little washies work about 230 yards 210m of a through row 7 of little washie cotton worsted weight yarn pattern piece should measure 4 75 cyca #4 i used 1 skein of wide x 3 long 12 cm wide x 7 5 cm bernat handicrafter delux long cotton in color rustic gray gauge for basket work through row 9 236yds 215m /142g 5oz per of basket pattern remember to hold skein note when crocheting yarn double piece should measure the basket the yarn is held 5 25 wide x 4 25 long 13 cm wide double for extra stiffness x 11 cm long you will need about 450 yards of a cotton worsted weight abbreviations and yarn cyca #4 to make enough little washies to fill up terms used in this the basket about 24 i used pattern 2 skeins of bernat handicrafter delux cotton 1 skein in color blo = back loop only this paprika and 1 skein in refers to the placement of your seaspray 236yds hook in an indicated stitch 215m /142g 5oz per skein when you insert your hook into size i/9 5 5mm crochet hook a stitch you normally insert or whatever size will give you your hook under the two loops the correct gauge- see below that form a v along the top yarn needle edge of your work the back removable stitch marker for loop is the half of the v that basket only is furthest away from you half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet yo insert size hook into next st yo and pull up loop yo and pull through all three little washies measured about 4 75 loops 12 cm square before washing and chain s = chain s drying and about 4 25 11 cm slip_stitch = slip_stitch insert hook into square after they were machine- next st yo and pull through to front wash ed and dried basket measures of work and through loop on hook about 8 x 6 x 3 5 20 5 x 15 x 9 st s = stitch es cm yo = yarn over the bottom of the chain this is
